name: Svelte Portfolio
description: A simple structured Portfoilo made with svelte & tailwind features blog from dev.to , github profile api , project rest api built on github
readme:
Svelte Portfolio

Svelte Portfolio is a free portfolject done with svelte , tailwind css and tailwind components .
This is my first svelte project it may have errors please open a issue & fork this repo to upgrade and send push request's

Table of Contents

  • Demo
  • Quick Start
  • Documentation
  • File Structure
  • Reporting Issues

  • Useful Links

Demo

  • Profile

  • Contact
  • Blog
  • Projects

Quick start

Quick start options:

  • Download from Github.

Terminal Commands

  1. Download and Install NodeJs LTS version from NodeJs Official Page.
  2. Navigate to the root / directory and run npm install or (yarn install, if you're using yarn) to install our local dependencies.
    # First, install dependencies npm install # Then, run it on dev mode npm run dev

Documentation

Navigate to wiki and get started with docs wiki page.

File Structure

 ├── svelte-portfolio │   ├── static │   │   ├── index.html │   │   ├── favicon.png │   │   ├── minifest.json     │   │   └── robots.txt │   ├── src │   │   ├── routes │   │   │   ├── __layout.svelte │   │   │   ├── about.svelte │   │   │   ├── index.svelte │   │   │   ├── blog.svelte     │   │   │   ├── contact.svelte │   │   │   ├── projects.svelte │   │   │   └── blog  │   │   │       └── [slug].svelte │   │   │   └── project │   │   │       └── [slug].svelte │   │   ├── App.css │   │   ├── app.html |   |   └── global.d.ts │   ├── package.json     │   ├── README.md
